gurmukhi: ਰਹੇ ਮੋਹ ਦੋਨੋ || ਟਰੇ ਨਾਹਿ ਕੋਨੋ ||
transliteration: Rahe Moh Dono|| Dare Naah(i) Kono||
translation: Both were attached to each other and none on them faltered.

gurmukhi: ਰਹੇ ਠਾਂਢ ਅੈਸੇ || ਰਣੰ ਬੀਰ ਜੈਸੇ ||੧੦੮||
transliteration: Rahe Thaandh Aise|| Ranan Beer Jaise||108||
translation: They stood firmly like the warrior in the battlefield.108.

gurmukhi: ਪਠੇ ਕੋਟ ਦੂਤੰ || ਚਲੇ ਪੳੁਨ ਪੂਤੰ ||
transliteration: Pathe Kot Dootan|| Chale Paoun Pootan||
translation: The messengers were sent in the fort who went swiftly like Hanuman, the son of wind-god.
The saw was placed after showing it to the gathered kings.109.

gurmukhi: ਲਯੋ ਰਾਮ ਪਾਨੰ || ਭਰਯੋ ਬੀਰ ਮਾਨੰ ||
transliteration: Layo Raam Paanan|| Bdaryo Beer Maanan||
translation: Ram took it in his hand, the hero (Ram) was filled with pride.

gurmukhi: ਹਸਯੋ ਅੈਚ ਲੀਨੋ || ੳੁਭੈ ਟੂਕ ਕੀਨੋ ||੧੧੦||
transliteration: Hasyo Aich Leeno|| Oubhai Took Keeno||110||
translation: He pulled it smilingly and broke it into two parts.110.

gurmukhi: ਸਭੈ ਦੇਵ ਹਰਖੇ || ਘਨੰ ਪੁਹਪ ਬਰਖੇ ||
transliteration: Sabhai Dev Harkhe|| Ghanan Puhap Barkhe||
translation: All the gods were pleased and a loot of flowers were showered.
Other kings felt shy and went back to their countries.111.

gurmukhi: ਤਬੈ ਰਾਜ ਕੰਨਿਅਾ || ਤਿਹੂੰ ਲੋਕ ਧੰਨਿਅਾ ||
transliteration: Tabai Raaj Kanniaa|| Tihoon Lok Dhanneeaa||
translation: Then the princess, the most fortunate in three worlds.

gurmukhi: ਧਰੇ ਫੂਲ ਮਾਲਾ || ਬਰਯੋ ਰਾਮ ਬਾਲਾ ||੧੧੨||
transliteration: Ddare Phool Maalaa|| Daryo Raam Baalaa||112||
translation: Garlanded Ram and wedded him as her spouse.112.

gurmukhi: ਕਿਧੌ ਦੇਵ ਕੰਨਿਅਾ ਕਿਧੌ ਬਾਸਵੀ ਹੈ || ਕਿਧੌ ਜੱਛਨੀ ਕਿੰਨ੍ਰਨੀ ਨਾਗਨੀ ਛੈ ||
transliteration: Kidhau Dev Kanniaa Kidhau Baasvihai|| Kidhau Jachchhanikinnraninaagadichhai||
translation: Sita appeared like the daughter of a god or Indra, daughter of a Naga, daughter of a Yaksha or daughter of a Kinnar.

gurmukhi: ਕਿਧੌ ਗੰਧ੍ਰਬੀ ਦੈਤ ਜਾ ਦੇਵਤਾ ਸੀ || ਕਿਧੌ ਸੂਰਜਾ ਸੁਧ ਸੋਧੀ ਸੁਧਾ ਸੀ ||੧੧੩||
transliteration: Kidhaudgaddhrabidait Jaa Devtaa See|| Kidhau Soorjaa Sudh Sodhisudhaa See||113||
translation: She looked like the daughter of a Gandharva, daughter of a demon or goddess. She appeared like the daughter of Sum or like the ambrosial light of the Moon.113.

gurmukhi: ਕਿਧੌ ਜੱਛ ਬਿੱਦਿਅਾ ਧਰੀ ਗੰਧ੍ਰਬੀ ਹੈ || ਕਿਧੌ ਰਾਗਨੀ ਭਾਗ ਪੂਰੇ ਰਚੀ ਹੈ ||
transliteration: Kidhau Jachchh Biddiaa Dharigaddhrahihaee|| Kidhau Raagadibhaag Poore Rachihai||
translation: She appeared like a Gandharva woman, having obtained the learning of Yakshas or a complete creation of a Ragini (musical mode).
